          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             That honor goes to Bruno Sammartino, who held the then WWWF Championship for seven years, eight months, and one day. He won the title from Buddy Rogers on May 17, 1963, and dropped it to Ivan Koloff on Jan. 18, 1971. Koloff held it for 20 days.
            </p>
           </div>

           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>

            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/page/wiki-users">
             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">
              Asked by
              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Wiki User
              </span>
             </p>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>

          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             Yes. All mammals, sans marsupials and rare egg-layers, have belly buttons. Belly buttons are simply remnants of the umbilical cords. Humans' belly buttons are pretty noticeable, but dogs' belly buttons are small scars that are usually covered in fur.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full flex null">
           <button class="h-9 rounded-md p-2 text-base flex items-center text-primaryColor border border-solid border-primaryColor" role="button" tabindex="1">

             <use xlink:href="#locked-icon">
             </use>
            </svg>
            <span class="text=-base">
             Locked
            </span>
           </button>

          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/How_long_did_the_1918_flu_pandemic_last">
            How long did the 1918 flu pandemic last
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>

             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">

              </span>

             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>

              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>

             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>

          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             The 1918 influenza pandemic ended in the summer of 1919. The disease was
             <a href="https://www.cdc.gov/flu/pandemic-resources/1918-commemoration/three-waves.htm" rel="nofollow ugc">
              first detected
             </a>
             in the U.S. in March 1918, and it surged three separate times. The second wave of illness (in the fall of 1918) was responsible for most of the deaths.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>

           <div class="ml-auto">

           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/What_does_the_S_in_Harry_S._Truman_stand_for">
            What does the "S" in Harry S. Truman stand for
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>

          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             Nothing! He didn't have a middle
             <em>
              name
             </em>
             , per se. According to Truman himself, the initial was a way to honor both his grandfathers, Anderson Shipp Truman and Solomon Young.
            </p>
           </div>

          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/When_do_hummingbirds_migrate">
            When do hummingbirds migrate
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
            </a>
            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/page/wiki-users">
             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">
              Asked by
              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Wiki User
              </span>
             </p>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a7 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a9 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <div class="a13 a25">
               20 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             Most hummingbirds
             <a href=" https://www.thespruce.com/when-is-hummingbird-migration-386451" rel="nofollow ugc">
              migrate south
             </a>
             in late August or early September, but some may start as early as July. They depart for the return trip as early as Januarythey have a long way to go and typically arrive by mid-May.
            </p>
            <p>
             Hummingbirds migrate individually, not in flocks, so there's actually a lot of variation in their migration habits. For example, older birds tend to start migrating earlier than younger ones.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full flex null">
           <div class="ml-auto">
            <button class="h-9 rounded-md p-2 text-base flex items-center bg-tertiary text-white" role="button" tabindex="1">
             <svg class="w-5 h-5 ml-1" viewbox="0 0 24 24">
              <use xlink:href="#create-icon">
              </use>
             </svg>
             <span class="text=-base">
              Answer
             </span>
            </button>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div>
         </div>
         <div class="grid grid-cols-1 cursor-pointer justify-start items-start my-4 p-4 bg-white md:rounded shadow-cardGlow">
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex h-full w-auto">
            <div class="mb-2 flex h-full w-auto">
             <div class=" bg-primaryColor hover:bg-primaryLight focus:bg-primaryLight bg-opacity-10 text-primaryColor h-7 mb-2 mr-2 px-2 cursor-pointer rounded flex justify-center items-center " property="breadcrumb">
              Prenatal Dietary Concerns
             </div>

              </use>
             </svg>
            </button>
           </div>
          </div>
          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/How_much_caffeine_can_you_drink_if_you_are_pregnant">
            How much caffeine can you drink if you are pregnant
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
            </a>
            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/page/wiki-users">
             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">
              Asked by
              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Wiki User
              </span>
             </p>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a7 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a9 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <div class="a13 a26">
               34 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             According to The American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists, consuming less than 200 milligrams of caffeine per day (roughly one to two cups of coffee) isn't a major contributing factor in miscarriage or preterm birth.
            </p>
            <p>
             However, according to a
             <a href="https://ebm.bmj.com/lookup/doi/10.1136/bmjebm-2020-111432" rel="nofollow ugc">
              new study
             </a>
             in the journal
             <em>
              BMJ Evidence-Based Medicine
             </em>
             , there is no safe level of caffeine that one can consume during pregnancy. Complications arising from caffeine consumption can include an increased risk of miscarriage, stillbirth, and low birth weight.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full flex null">
           <div class="ml-auto">
            <button class="h-9 rounded-md p-2 text-base flex items-center bg-tertiary text-white" role="button" tabindex="1">
             <svg class="w-5 h-5 ml-1" viewbox="0 0 24 24">
              <use xlink:href="#create-icon">
              </use>
             </svg>
             <span class="text=-base">
              Answer
             </span>
            </button>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

         </div>

            <div class="mb-2 flex h-full w-auto">
             <div class=" bg-primaryColor hover:bg-primaryLight focus:bg-primaryLight bg-opacity-10 text-primaryColor h-7 mb-2 mr-2 px-2 cursor-pointer rounded flex justify-center items-center " property="breadcrumb">
              Amphibians
             </div>
             <div class=" bg-primaryColor hover:bg-primaryLight focus:bg-primaryLight bg-opacity-10 text-primaryColor h-7 mb-2 mr-2 px-2 cursor-pointer rounded flex justify-center items-center " property="breadcrumb">
              Salamanders and Newts
             </div>
            </div>

             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a9 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <div class="a13 a27">
               40 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             Nope,
             <a href="https://www.britannica.com/animal/salamander" rel="nofollow ugc">
              salamanders
             </a>
             arent lizardssurprisingly, they arent even reptiles. Theyre amphibians.
            </p>
            <p>
             Its understandable to mistake the slender, long-tailed, little-legged creatures for lizards, but theyre actually closer relatives to frogs. Take a look at themyou can kind of see it! Like frogs and other amphibians, salamander babies have gills and live in the water, then move to moist land as adults. Thats because their adult skin absorbs water but also loses it, so they need constant replenishment.
            </p>
            <p>
             Lizards (and all reptiles) dont need to live on moist land. While some are comfortable in the water, they can never breathe it, and their scaly skin prevents water loss.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>

              </use>

             </span>

          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/What_is_the_man_flu">
            What is the man flu
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
            </a>
            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/u/agustinamacejkovic">
             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">
              Asked by
              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Agustina Macejkovic
              </span>
             </p>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a7 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a9 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <div class="a13 a28">
               70 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             The term man flu stems from the idea that men are prone to exaggerating the severity of their symptoms when experiencing the common cold or another minor ailment. Although the phrase is most often used in a tongue-in-cheek way, there may be some merit to the male whine. In 2017s customarily playful (but still peer-reviewed) Christmas edition of
             <em>
              The BMJ
             </em>
             , professor Kyle Sue
             <a href="https://www.bmj.com/company/newsroom/man-flu-may-be-real/" rel="nofollow ugc">
              pointed to research
             </a>
             suggesting that men are more susceptible to complications when suffering from an acute respiratory disease. Theyre also more likely to go to the hospital and, unfortunately, succumb to the flu.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full flex null">
           <div class="ml-auto">
            <button class="h-9 rounded-md p-2 text-base flex items-center bg-tertiary text-white" role="button" tabindex="1">
             <svg class="w-5 h-5 ml-1" viewbox="0 0 24 24">
              <use xlink:href="#create-icon">
              </use>
             </svg>
             <span class="text=-base">
              Answer
             </span>
            </button>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div>
         </div>
         <div class="grid grid-cols-1 cursor-pointer justify-start items-start my-4 p-4 bg-white md:rounded shadow-cardGlow">
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex h-full w-auto">
            <div class="mb-2 flex h-full w-auto">
             <div class=" bg-primaryColor hover:bg-primaryLight focus:bg-primaryLight bg-opacity-10 text-primaryColor h-7 mb-2 mr-2 px-2 cursor-pointer rounded flex justify-center items-center " property="breadcrumb">
              Political Parties
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="relative inline-block">
            <button class="h-3">
             <svg class="h-6 w-6 transform rotate-90" viewbox="0 0 24 24">
              <use fill="#B6BAC0" xlink:href="#menu-dots">
              </use>
             </svg>
            </button>
           </div>
          </div>
          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/What_is_the_political_symbolism_behind_the_donkey_and_the_elephant">
            What is the political symbolism behind the donkey and the elephant
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
            </a>
            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/u/savannaparisian">
             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">
              Asked by
              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Savanna Parisian
              </span>
             </p>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a7 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a9 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>

             <li>
              <div class="a13 a29">
               26 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>

          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             The Democratic Partys donkey
             <a href="https://www.history.com/news/how-did-the-republican-and-democratic-parties-get-their-animal-symbols" rel="nofollow ugc">
              can be traced
             </a>
             back to the 1828 presidential campaign of Andrew Jackson, whose opponents referred to him as a jackass. Jackson embraced the image and featured the donkey on his campaign posters. Years later, a political cartoonist named Thomas Nast helped popularize the donkey as a symbol for the whole Democratic Party.
            </p>
            <p>
             Nast was also responsible for promoting the elephant as a symbol for the Republican Party. He first used it in an 1874 drawing titled
             <a href="http://public.media.smithsonianmag.com/legacy_blog/rublican-elephant-cartoon.jpg" rel="nofollow ugc">
              The Third-Term Panic
             </a>
             featuring an elephant labeled The Republican vote. He continued to use the elephant as a symbol for the party, and other cartoonists followed suit, cementing the association.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>

           <div class="ml-auto">
            <button class="h-9 rounded-md p-2 text-base flex items-center bg-tertiary text-white" role="button" tabindex="1">

              <use xlink:href="#create-icon">
              </use>
             </svg>
             <span class="text=-base">
              Answer
             </span>
            </button>
           </div>

         </div>

          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex h-full w-auto">
            <div class="mb-2 flex h-full w-auto">
             <div class=" bg-primaryColor hover:bg-primaryLight focus:bg-primaryLight bg-opacity-10 text-primaryColor h-7 mb-2 mr-2 px-2 cursor-pointer rounded flex justify-center items-center " property="breadcrumb">
              Fish
             </div>
             <div class=" bg-primaryColor hover:bg-primaryLight focus:bg-primaryLight bg-opacity-10 text-primaryColor h-7 mb-2 mr-2 px-2 cursor-pointer rounded flex justify-center items-center " property="breadcrumb">
              Freshwater Fish
             </div>
             <div class=" bg-primaryColor hover:bg-primaryLight focus:bg-primaryLight bg-opacity-10 text-primaryColor h-7 mb-2 mr-2 px-2 cursor-pointer rounded flex justify-center items-center " property="breadcrumb">
              Saltwater Fish
             </div>

          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/Do_fish_drink_water">
            Do fish drink water
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
            </a>
            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/page/wiki-users">
             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">
              Asked by
              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Wiki User
              </span>
             </p>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a7 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a9 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <div class="a13 a30">
               105 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             Fresh water fish absorb water through their skin and gills,
saltwater fish actually do drink water.
            </p>
            <p>
             In saltwater fish, they have to drink because their body's
concentration of salt is lower than the surrounding water.
Therefore, they have to drink huge amounts of water every day to
stay hydrated.
            </p>
            <p>
             In freshwater fish, their salt concentration is higher than that
of the surrounding water, and, as osmosis dictates, they absorb
water through their highly permeable skin. To keep from bursting,
freshwater fish actually have to excrete water, up to 10 times
their body weight daily, unlike saltwater fish.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>

           <div class="ml-auto">

             <svg class="w-5 h-5 ml-1" viewbox="0 0 24 24">
              <use xlink:href="#create-icon">
              </use>
             </svg>
             <span class="text=-base">
              Answer
             </span>
            </button>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

         </div>
         <div class="grid grid-cols-1 cursor-pointer justify-start items-start my-4 p-4 bg-white md:rounded shadow-cardGlow">

           <div class="flex h-full w-auto">
            <div class="mb-2 flex h-full w-auto">
             <div class=" bg-primaryColor hover:bg-primaryLight focus:bg-primaryLight bg-opacity-10 text-primaryColor h-7 mb-2 mr-2 px-2 cursor-pointer rounded flex justify-center items-center " property="breadcrumb">
              Health
             </div>

              Personal Hygiene
             </div>

          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/What_is_better_to_take_a_shower_in_the_morning_or_at_night">
            Is it better to take a shower in the morning or at night
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>

            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/u/lavernasenger">

              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Laverna Senger
              </span>
             </p>

           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>

              <a>

               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>

              <div class="a13 a31">
               147 answers
              </div>

          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             It depends on what you will do/have done that day. Normally it
would be better to have a shower in the morning (to wash away the
night's dirt and sweat, and make you clean for that day). But lets
say you have been out in the hot sun sweating, after you would want
to take a shower So it just depends what type of person you
are!
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>

          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">

            Why do we blow out candles on birthday cakes
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
            </a>
            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/u/alexandrarussel">
             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">
              Asked by
              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Alexandra Russel
              </span>
             </p>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a7 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a9 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <div class="a13 a32">
               45 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             This tradition has murky origins, but some believe it can be traced back to the
             <a href="https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/54069/why-do-we-blow-out-candles-birthday-cakes" rel="nofollow ugc">
              ancient Greeks
             </a>
             . They would put candles on round, moon-shaped cakes to pay tribute to the moon goddess, Artemis, with the glow of the candles symbolizing moonlight.
            </p>
            <p>
             Many ancient cultures also believed that smoke could carry prayers up to the heavens, which could be the basis for why many people make a wish before blowing out their candles.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>

           <div class="ml-auto">

              </use>
             </svg>

             </span>
            </button>

            <div class="mb-2 flex h-full w-auto">

              Books and Literature

          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/Does_listening_to_an_audiobook_count_as_reading_it">
            Does listening to an audiobook count as reading it
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>

               SeraSmith

           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>

          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             No, I don't think so. Audiobooks are great, you are still absorbing the story while able to multitask by walking the dog, doing chores, etc. , But I think reading a book and listening to a book are two different experiences.
            </p>

          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/What_is_the_%E2%80%98batman_effect%E2%80%99">
            What is the Batman Effect
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
            </a>
            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/u/curtisstrite">
             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">
              Asked by
              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Curtis Strite
              </span>
             </p>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a7 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a9 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <div class="a13 a34">
               32 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             The Batman Effect is a strategy used to motivate children and improve their perseverance by having them adopt the persona of their favorite superhero or other hardworking character.
             <a href="https://srcd.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1111/cdev.12695" rel="nofollow ugc">
              Studies have shown
             </a>
             that children are better able to focus and complete repetitive or boring tasks when they think from the external perspective of a character they admire.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full flex null">
           <div class="ml-auto">
            <button class="h-9 rounded-md p-2 text-base flex items-center bg-tertiary text-white" role="button" tabindex="1">
             <svg class="w-5 h-5 ml-1" viewbox="0 0 24 24">
              <use xlink:href="#create-icon">
              </use>
             </svg>
             <span class="text=-base">
              Answer
             </span>
            </button>
           </div>
          </div>

           <div class="flex h-full w-auto">
            <div class="mb-2 flex h-full w-auto">
             <div class=" bg-primaryColor hover:bg-primaryLight focus:bg-primaryLight bg-opacity-10 text-primaryColor h-7 mb-2 mr-2 px-2 cursor-pointer rounded flex justify-center items-center " property="breadcrumb">
              Movies
             </div>

              Oscars
             </div>
            </div>

            <p>

             <span>

             </span>
             (1976).

          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/How_can_i_vote_early">
            How can I vote early
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
            </a>
            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/u/nashohara">
             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">
              Asked by
              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Nash O'Hara
              </span>
             </p>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a7 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a9 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <div class="a13 a36">
               22 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             Most states allow registered voters to cast their ballots before Election Day. However, the rules for early voting vary from
             <a href="https://www.ncsl.org/research/elections-and-campaigns/early-voting-in-state-elections.aspx#Early%20Voting%20Law%20Table" rel="nofollow ugc">
              state to state
             </a>
             , so youll need to check with your state or territorial election office website for specifics. Due to the coronavirus, many states are making it easier for citizens to vote absentee by mail this year. Again, you'll have to check your individual state or territory's rules, but in most cases, you need to fill out an application for an absentee ballot and mail it in or drop it off at your local election office.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>

              <use xlink:href="#create-icon">
              </use>
             </svg>
             <span class="text=-base">

             </span>
            </button>

             <li>

               58 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             Any kind of privacy. And also polar bears.

          <h1 class="w-full text-primaryText mb-3 break-words text-h1" property="name">
           <a class="hover:no-underline text-primaryText font-fira font-semibold" href="https://www.answers.com/Q/Which_was_the_game_first_played_in_space">
            What was the first game played in space
            <!-- -->
            ?
           </a>
          </h1>
          <div class="flex justify-between">
           <div class="flex m-1 items-center">
            <a>
             <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
            </a>
            <a class="hover:no-underline " href="https://www.answers.com/u/dahliahagenes">
             <p class="text-primaryText text-xs font-serif ml-1">
              Asked by
              <span class="text-primaryColor" property="creator">
               Dahlia Hagenes
              </span>
             </p>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div class="a4">
            <ul class="a5">
             <li class="a6 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a7 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a8 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a9 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="a10 a12">
              <a>
               <img alt="User Avatar" class="avatar-h-20 avatar-img" src="https://img.answers.com/answ/image/upload/dpr_2.0,w_20,h_20/v1573840443/avatars/default.png"/>
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <div class="a13 a38">
               42 answers
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full font-serif text-base">
           <div class="markdownStyles" property="content">
            <p>
             <a href="https://www.guinnessworldrecords.com/world-records/109300-first-person-to-play-a-videogame-in-space#:~:text=Serebrov%20(b.,MIR%20Space%20Station%20in%201993." rel="nofollow ugc">
              Tetris
             </a>
             was the first video game played in spaceRussian cosmonaut Aleksandr A. Serebrov took his Game Boy with him on his 1993 mission to the MIR Space Station, and he played Tetris in his (limited) downtime.
            </p>
            <p>
             In 2008, NASA astronaut Greg Chamitoff played several
             <a href="https://en.chessbase.com/post/che-in-space-houston-we-have-a-checkmate" rel="nofollow ugc">
              remote games of chess
             </a>
             from the International Space Station against different planet-bound Earthlings. He used a felt board and affixed velcro to the bottom of the pieces to make sure none of them disappeared into the void.
            </p>
            <p>
             The first-ever space sport was a 2018
             <a href="https://nypost.com/2018/02/07/astronauts-play-first-ever-sporting-event-in-space/" rel="nofollow ugc">
              doubles badminton match
             </a>
             between Russian, American, and Japanese crewmembers of the ISS. The zero gravity environment made things a little tricky, but at the end of the day, they didn't even keep score"friendship won."
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="w-full flex null">
           <div class="ml-auto">
